mapper.insert: insert into menu (id, name, menu_type, permission_code, parent_id, icon, url, sort, enable, create_time, update_time) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{menuType}, #{permissionCode}, #{parentId}, #{icon}, #{url}, #{sort}, #{enable}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update menu set name = #{name}, menu_type = #{menuType}, permission_code = #{permissionCode}, parent_id = #{parentId}, icon = #{icon}, url = #{url}, sort = #{sort}, enable = #{enable}, update_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from menu where enable = '1' order by menu.sort desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset}
select count(*) from menu where enable = '1'
select * from menu where enable = '1' and parent_id = #{parentId} order by menu.create_time desc
select * from menu where enable = '1' and id = #{id}
